description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7fe53","text":"This collection contains the protocols for production, quality control, packaging and use of Beneficial Bio's dehydrated OpenVent DNA Polymerase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q0ji","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnf30","text":"Format: 32 tubes (4x8-tube PCR strips) 20ul of Enzyme each","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":58}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjqfv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7sei","text":"OpenVent DNA polymerase is an extremely high thermostable and high fidelity enzyme suitable for routine PCR applications and amplification of GC-rich or looped sequences. The enzyme is compatible with a wide range of templates and its robustness guarantees reliable amplification results in almost all PCR applications. The Eco and room temperature stable format - PCR reaction tube strips containing the dehydrated enzyme (10 reactions per tube), offers affordability and flexibility.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ek3fh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5m0k","text":"FEATURES","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4n3f","text":"Dehydrated formulation enables better stability at room temperature","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvu1l","text":"Ideal for a wide range of applications including GC-rich or looped sequences amplification","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c04u3","text":"Amplification of low copy DNA targets","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2evn8","text":"Eco formulation and flexible format","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qtb2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ee8u","text":"DOCUMENTS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20oon","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ccho","text":"Product (PSS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":33}],"data":{}},{"key":"5nb1j","text":"Certificate of Analysis
